alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; East Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 7:05PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 730 PM MST... At 705 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Mountain Park, or near Laveen, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Tempe, Paradise Valley, Laveen, Mesa Riverview Mall, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, Piestewa Peak Park, Arizona Mills Mall, Downtown Mesa, South Phoenix, Arizona State Fairgrounds, South Mountain Park, Downtown Phoenix, Downtown Scottsdale, Arizona State University, Fiesta Mall, Camelback Mountain and Sky Harbor Airport. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 143 and 160. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 202. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; East Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee
